review: Let me first say I was the most excited person ever to get my Fire TV in! I have 2 Apple TVs already so with me having an Android phone I was anxious to get something that would work better with my Note 3! I was very disappointed after setting it up to find out that Showtime Anytime did not let me login bc they don't allow DIRECTV subscribers to use it or log in! I was so frustrated to find this out! I really hope it is not the same way when they get HBO GO in the future. The screen mirroring does not work on the Fire TV either but it is working on my Fire TV Stick! I'm super disappointed by this!The Netflix doesn't always work and sometimes requires me to sign in again as well.I hope these are just bugs and get resolved by future software updates and Amazon allows Showtime Anytime to accept Directv subscribers. The Kindle version allows it so why not the Fire TV???
